content: 2 k2tog x3 3 sts break yarn and pull end through remaining sts using tapestry needle finishing when sewing pieces together i recommend using mattress stitch to create smooth transitions position beak on head and sew in place add eyes by tying knots of cc onto head use loose ends to close all gaps in comb position comb on head and sew in place stuff head and attach to body attach both wattle pieces by sewing their entire perimeter onto the head and body stuff tail and attach to body weave in any remaining loose ends enjoy chart a 6 chart b 7
